buttonTypeCode: Dashed Danger
buttonDisabledCode:
<!-- Primary -->
<button nz-button nzType="primary">Primary</button>

<!-- Dashed -->
<button nz-button nzType="dashed">Dashed</button>
<button nz-button nzType="dashed" disabled>Dashed(disabled)</button>
